img_text: starttheworld 29m trainforvalhalla The goal of civilization seems to be to eliminate work and risk, but the world has changed more than we have. Our bodies crave work and sex, our minds crave risk and conflict. ~Jack Donovan @starttheworld Society, the media, the govemment, and weak ass people continually try to kill the fundamental and primal nature inside everyone and try to make us believe its wrong." I say they're wrong. Its the only thing helping us hold on to our sanity in an insane world. #FuckTheirAgenda #QuitTryingToMakePeoplePussies
